app.description:
Webhooks lets you connect your account with external systems and automate workflows in real time.
Instantly send appointment, customer, or payment events to your own apps or third-party services â€” enabling powerful integrations and seamless data sync.

url.label: Webhook URL
url.tooltip: Enter the URL where webhook events will be sent via POST requests

secret.label: Webhook Secret (Optional)
secret.tooltip: If provided, webhook payloads will be signed with HMAC-SHA256. Leave empty to send webhooks without signatures.

eventTypes.label: Event Types
eventTypes.tooltip: Select which events should trigger webhooks to this URL

created.label: Appointment Created
created.description: Triggered when a new appointment is created

created.label: Customer Created
created.description: Triggered when a new customer is created

updated.label: Customer Updated
updated.description: Triggered when customer information is updated

created.label: Payment Created
created.description: Triggered when a new payment is created

updated.label: Payment Updated
updated.description: Triggered when payment information is updated

deleted.label: Payment Deleted
deleted.description: Triggered when a payment is deleted

refunded.label: Payment Refunded
refunded.description: Triggered when a payment is refunded

eventTypes.required: Please select at least one event type
